amendment.description: Amendment sought to make a 2% across the board reduction in funds, with the exception of counterterrorism accounts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds made available by this Act by 2 percent. The reduction shall not apply to counter-terrorism accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 316 (Roll no. 368).
